reviewtext: Black letters on white background are clear dense and sharp.  Despite the the complaints of other reviewers, I have not had problems with print quality, sticking to smooth surfaces (glass spice bottles, metal surfaces, etc).  You can't beat the price with Amazon Prime, under $5.50 to your door in two days.  Dymo has always been the gold standard in label machines since I was in elementary school in the early 1960s and we had the manual "label embosser" machine.  Very pleased.
